channel.title: Advice on game
channel.description: I want to make my first game and I have decided on blackjack because it is a very simple concept. I just want to have it embeded on a page on my site. What do you more experienced coders think would be easier, have a java server running to handle it or use sql? I am leaning towards sql because I can't even seem to make a working java chat server yet lol... Also, can you think of anyhtign that might be hard to do while making it?

item.title: Advice on game
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I want to make my first game and I have decided on blackjack because it is a very simple concept. I just want to have it embeded on a page on my site. What do you more experienced coders think would be easier, have a java server running to handle it or use sql? I am leaning towards sql because I can’t even seem to make a working java chat server yet lol… Also, can you think of anyhtign that might be hard to do while making it?
